ygData.messageBody:
I have seen this exact behavior in other zones as well, namely Misty Thicket, Blackburrow and Upper Guk. Merely running past an ongoing melee that I am not involved in seems to then later adjust my faction when the melee concludes. As you stated, so far I have not disliked the behavior because the faction adjustments are in my favor, but it definitely seems to be a bug.

Back from lurker mode because a silent bard is as useless as lipstick on a troll.

Keledal
Bard of Erollisi Marr
